ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Shipali Vallampatla has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 5 years. Currently this candidate is employed as a SQL Developer at Hyundai. Shipali has extensive knowledge of Oracle PL/SQL, SQL, Oracle, UNIX, Oracle Toad, ISP, shell scripting, SQLPlus, PVCS, Oracle 9i, Oracle 11g, Oracle 10G, XML, TOAD, Stored Procedures, Oracle tools, Web Services, SDLC, Request, Oracle Projects. So far Shipali has not gained any managerial experience.
